name: Cozy Cubes
description:
Welcome to Cozy Cubes - a 2D puzzle game inspired by the classic Sokoban! In a world every physicist has dreamt of, where friction can be ignored, can you push the blocks to the designated spots?

Features

  • 30 unique levels
  • Varying levels of difficulty suitable for both casual and hardcore puzzlers
  • Aim for minimum number of moves in a level to get a medal
  • Gimmicks to spice up later levels: bounce pads, breakable walls etc.
  • Simple custom level creator for you to experiment with your own levels
  • Save data stored locally
  • Game is still under development, more to come...

Getting Started

  1. Download the zip file suitable for your OS. 
  2. Unzip the contents.
  3. Run the CozyCubes application.

How to Play

Use arrow keys or WASD to slide the player (blue cube) around. Use "Z" key to undo a move and "R" key to restart a level. Push every red cube onto a spot with a red dot to win a level.
